title: Project Yasuo AA's
body:
So project yasuos AA are really awkward like cs'ing with him is kinda hard because of it 

so you know maybe a quick fix for it?
pls riot

replies.body:
Heya!

PROJECT: Yasuo's auto attacks are actually working as intended. PROJECT: Yasuo has one different auto attack than the base - he makes an overhead -> downward hit motion, as opposed to the three sweeping motions that the base uses, which may explain the different feel.
I guess I just get used to it feeling a tiny bit weird then

You aren't wrong that there is a difference, it's just not broken, per se. :P It may take a bit of getting used to, similarly how different sounds on Riven's Q's may throw people off initially. I know for me, sound cues can throw me off.

guys pls help
I drew you art of riven vs yasuo

http://imgur.com/7riGFKz
